attributes.action: Ban Online Gambling In The UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wish that the Goverment would ban online gambling websites like JackpotJoy as these online sites are causing misery and also these online websites are causing more people to become compulsive gamblers. These company are not govened correctly and the new gambling act which comes into play this year is not worth the paper it is written on.

BAN ONLINE GAMBLING SITES.
